questions.name: incidentResponseTestFrequency
questions.label: How often will the IR plan be tested?
questions.placeholder: functionally at least annually.  Additional tests every six months.

questions.name: incidentTrainingEnvironment
questions.label: (H) What is the automated tool that provides the training environment?  ex:ThreatAlert Security Platform

questions.name: incidentTrainingFrequency
